title: The War on Science Goes Batshit
description: Timothy Thompson wants to do five things during his freshman year at Batshit High:1. Make Megan Chow his girlfriend.2. Save Mike, the schoolâ€™s star football player, from failing 9th grade and being kicked off the team.3. Stop his best friend, Josh, from being jealous about Megan and Mike.4. Keep religion in the form of intelligent design out of his science classes.5. Not get killed.How many of these will he be able to check off his list?
author: Allen J. Woppert
